attributes.action: More rights for hard working single dads
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition for better rights for hard working fathers.i think it's about time the goverment changed the system more for the fathers of this country.i work very hard at my job to succeed in life and I believe in working hard for my kids but what I don't believe in is constantly been stopped with getting on with rest of my life.i believe in providing for my kids but living on my own I find it hard financially as well as socially.i would love to have my kids more instead get penalised through finances instead ,I just think it's time fathers have a chance to provide for there children but also have more support.so please I'm asking for signTures so we can take this to parliment
